p: A novel picornavirus, named feline sakobuvirus A, was identified and appeared distantly related to other feline picornaviruses of the genera Sapelovirus ( Lau et al., 2012b) and Kobuvirus ( Chung et al., 2013). The feline sakobuvirus represents the prototype species for a novel genus, tentatively proposed as Sakobuvirus ( Ng et al., 2014).
